heading: How high is the share of people aged 25-34 with a tertiary educational attainment across all EU countries?
subheading: The EU has claimed a target-level of 45% for tertiary educational attainment by 2030. As of 2022, more than 40 % of persons aged 25-34 years in the EU27 had completed tertiary education. Tertiary Education is relevant for enhancing employment opportunities and societal participation.
tooltip1: of 25-34 aged with tertiary educational attainment
textNote: Tertiary education i.e. education provided by universities and other higher education institutions.
